act:
603988 THE AUROVILLE (EMERGENCY PROVISIONS) REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 37 OF 2001 [ 4th September, 2001]
An Act to repeal the Auroville (Emergency Provisions) Act, 1980.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
932780 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Auroville (Emergency Provisions) Repeal Act, 2001.
969202 2Repeal of Act 59 of 1980.- The Auroville (Emergency Provisions) Act, 1980 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
